About Me

Let Me Share A Few Things About Myself...

BIO

I'm a Computer Science major interested in full-stack web development and database design. I turned toward web development as an opportunity to improve my understanding of how websites are made and to appreciate the effort it takes to build one. My passion for continuous learning and growth has allowed me to really focus on improving myself, as well as, developing cleaner, and more robust code.
